H0.text: this inventor co-created the film fred ott 's sneeze. Eadweard Muybridge

H1.text: this inventor co-created the film fred ott 's sneeze. Louis Le Prince

H2.text: this inventor co-created the film fred ott 's sneeze. William Kennedy Dickson

H3.text: this inventor co-created the film fred ott 's sneeze. Edison

A4.text: Fred Ott's Sneeze (also known as Edison Kinetoscopic Record of a Sneeze) is an 1894 short, black-and-white silent film shot by William K.L. Dickson and featuring Fred Ott.

A5.text: The film was produced by the Edison Manufacturing Company

A6.text: The majority of the productions were short films showing everything from acrobats to parades to fire calls including titles such as Fred Ott's Sneeze (1894)
